thread.title: You decide between SCAM and BJP, Modi tells UP people
thread.title_full: You decide between SCAM and BJP, Modi tells UP people

author: Mohammad Ali
title: You decide between SCAM and BJP, Modi tells UP people
text:
February 04, 2017 16:21   16:25 IST more-in Assembly Elections Modi said “Murderers and goons have flourished in UP due to political patronage.” 
During an election rally in Meerut, Uttar Pradesh, on Saturday, Prime Minister Narendra Modi asked the people to vote for BJP and said “SCAM stands for ‘Save UP from Congress, Akhilesh, Mayawati’.” 
Mr. Modi said “People of UP will have to decide if they want SCAM or BJP.” 
The Prime Minister further added “Those who could not save themselves and who were eliminated from UP by people, how can they save Uttar Pradesh.” 
Mr. Modi said “Murderers and goons have flourished in UP due to political patronage.” 
Mr. Modi asserted “If voted to power in UP, BJP will clear all dues of sugarcane farmers within 14 days.”
